titleStmt.title: Die Lunæ 5 Iunii. 1648. Resolved upon the question by the the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled, that the fifth and twentieth part be leavied upon none, but such delinquents as are within the ordinances of sequestrations.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: by John Wright, at the Kings Head in the Old-Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Order to print signed: Joh. Brown, Cler. Parliamentorum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old-Bayley
